select t.rowid,t.sxh,t.shum,t.tsfljc,t.bmmc,t.zbh,t.qmkc from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by sxh desc) as rowid,sxh,shum,tsfljc,bmmc,zbh,qmkc from (select sxh,shum,tsfljc,bmmc,zbh,sum(qmkc) qmkc from kucunview
and kwbh = '00HG' and qmkc > 0 and sxh not like '%W%'
and shum like '%' + #{shum} + '%'
and tsfljc = #{tsfljc}
and zbh like '%' + #{zbh} + '%'
and bmmc like '%' + #{bmmc} + '%'
group by sxh,shum,tsfljc,bmmc,zbh) kcjl) t where t.rowid between #{startno} and #{endno}
select count(*) total from ( select sxh,shum,tsfljc,bmmc,zbh,sum(qmkc) qmkc from kucunview where kwbh = '00HG' and qmkc > 0 and sxh not like '%W%' group by sxh,shum,tsfljc,bmmc,zbh) kcjl

select txrq,sxh,sum(cs) cs from ( select rkdbh,djlx, sxh,CONVERT(varchar(100), txrq, 23) txrq,cs,kwmc from RkmxView union select rkdbh,djlx, sxh,CONVERT(varchar(100), txrq, 23) txrq,cs,kwmc from RkmxnView ) rkmxjl where djlx = '产品入库' and kwmc not like '%退货%' and kwmc not like '%报废%' and kwmc not like '%出入%' and kwmc not like '%生产%' group by txrq,sxh

select sxh,txrq,sum(cs) cs from (select djlx,CONVERT(varchar(100), txrq, 23) txrq,sxh,cs,kwmc from FxsmxView union select djlx,CONVERT(varchar(100), txrq, 23) txrq,sxh,cs,kwmc from FxsmxnView ) pdjlb where djlx = '盘点' and kwmc not like '%报废%' and kwmc not like '%退货%' and kwmc not like '%出入%' and kwmc not like '%生产%' group by sxh,txrq
